jp.co.tanita.comm.ble

Class TNTBLEPeripheral

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.co.tanita.comm.ble.TNTBLEPeripheral

  • public class TNTBLEPeripheral
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles communication with TANITA devices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      The peripheral state.

      • saveUserInformation

        public void saveUserInformation(TNTUserInformation userInformation,
                       int number)
        Save user information to peripheral.

        notice:peripheral replace own user information with newer one which compares registration date between app just saved and peripheral already retained.

        Parameters:
        userInformation - The user information that save to peripheral.
        number - The personal number which is registered with peripheral.(zero-based indexing)ï¼Ž
